newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Banco de Occidente's net profit rises.
newsitem.headline: Banco de Occidente's net profit rises.

text.p: Colombia's Banco de Occidente, the country's ninth largest bank in terms of assets, reported the following 1996 results.
Net profit 50.65 billion pesos vs 42.67 billion in 1995.
NOTE: Net profit figure for 1996 is subject to revision by Colombia's Banking Superintendency.
